DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether difference muscle strength anterior cruciate ligament compare 2 surgery technics . Using either autograft hamstring tendon autograft quadriceps tendon .
DOC.brief_title: Anterior Cruciate Ligament-reconstruction : Quadriceps Tendon Hamstrings Tendon ? A Prospective Trial
DOC.criteria: Anterior cruciate ligament rupture current malignant disease Rheumatoid arthritis Other knee ligament instability Obesity BMI > 30 Morbus Bechterew
